items.title: In pictures: US President Donald Trump on second state to UK
items.description: President Trump greeted by the King and Queen and other senior royals at Windsor Castle.

items.title: EU proposes curbs on trade with Israel over Gaza war
items.description: Despite the forceful language, the measures appear unlikely to pass and have been condemned by Israel.

items.title: Search for ancient Egyptian gold bracelet missing from Cairo museum
items.description: A photo of the 3,000-year-old bracelet has been sent to airports, seaports and border crossings to stop it being smuggled out of the country.

items.title: Obama says US faces 'political crisis' after killing of Charlie Kirk
items.description: The former president criticised the response to the shooting by President Trump, who has vowed to tackle "radical leftists".

items.title: Trucks set ablaze as militants block key Senegal-Mali trade route
items.description: Islamists fighters are trying to prevent deliveries of fuel and other essential supplies to landlocked Mali.
